Bibliopedia Project

Overview

This is a brief overview of the Bibliopedia project. It provides a quick snapshot of what our project is about and its main goals.

Project Description

Bibliopedia is a comprehensive library management system designed to streamline book cataloging, borrowing, and returning processes. Our system aims to enhance the efficiency of library operations and improve user experience for both librarians and patrons.
